mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CMS_TEMPLATE_INFO ( ID, ALIAS, MODEL_ID, TEMPLATE_PATH, ORDERS, IS_ABLE, ABLE_TIME, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{templatePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isAble,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_CMS_TEMPLATE_INFO.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE CMS_TEMPLATE_INFO
ALIAS = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TEMPLATE_PATH = #{templatePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERS = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ABLE = #{isAble,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ABLE_TIME = #{ableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
